attributes.action: assist the many pubs which are likely to go out of business due to the smoking ban with VAT/Tax breaks which would allow them to bring beer prices down to attract custom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The many pubs and clubs which have gone out of business in Irland and Scotland would have benifited from tax breaks on beer and also VAT rebates/breaks to assist in the business staying open. If a lot of pubs close down, that would mean more unemployed people claiming off the state. Inline with the new legislation, these breaks should apply to any venue which is smoke free and where business has been affected.
